markdown:
| icon           = poe2 huana_ruins_rubbing icon.png
| description    = This rubbing was taken from the blighted ruin of Motare o Kōzi, and shows a complex navigational system used by the ancient Huana - likely intended to aid any lost travelers on their way home. Since cataclysm reconfigured much of the Deadfire, the coordinates are all obsolete. Still, a reference to Ukaizo means that this rubbing might be of value to more than just historians.
| added_in       = poe2
